    • Method Detail

      • clearDarkImage

        @POST(value="v3/branding-images/dark/{reference}/clear")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> clearDarkImage(@Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                        java.lang.String reference)
        Revert an image to dark theme default. Revert an account branding image to dark theme default. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/branding-images/dark/{reference}/clear \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        reference - Name of the branding images (icon or picture). (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getAllDarkImageData

        @GET(value="v3/branding-images/dark")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingImageList> getAllDarkImageData()
        Get metadata of all dark theme images. Retrieve metadata for all dark theme branding images. **Example:** `curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/branding-images/dark \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImageList>

        @GET(value="v3/branding-images/light")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingImageList> getAllLightImageData()

        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImageList>

retrofit2.Call<BrandingImage> getDarkImageData(@Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                  java.lang.String reference)
        Get metadata of a dark theme image. Retrieve metadata for one account dark theme branding image. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/branding-images/dark/{reference} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImage>

      • uploadDarkImage

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:image/png")
 @POST(value="v3/branding-images/dark/{reference}/upload")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingImage> uploadDarkImage(@Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String reference,
                                                                                                                                                    @Body
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String body)
        Upload a dark theme image. Upload a new account branding image in the dark theme in PNG or JPEG format. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/branding-images/dark/{reference}/upload \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: image/png' --data-binary '@myimage.png' ```
        Parameters:
        reference - Name of the branding images (icon or picture). (required)
        body - The image in PNG or JPEG format. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImage>

      • uploadDarkImageMultipart

        @Multipart
 @POST(value="v3/branding-images/dark/{reference}/upload-multipart")
retrofit2.Call<BrandingImage> uploadDarkImageMultipart(@Path(value="reference",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String reference,
                                                                                                                                         @Part
                                                                                                                                         okhttp3.MultipartBody.Part image)
        Upload a dark theme image. Upload a new account branding image as form data in the dark theme in PNG or JPEG format.
        Parameters:
        reference - Name of the branding images (icon or picture). (required)
        image - The image in PNG or JPEG format as multipart form data. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImage>

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:image/png")
 @POST(value="v3/branding-images/light/{reference}/upload")

        Parameters:
        reference - Name of the branding images (icon or picture). (required)
        body - The image in PNG or JPEG format. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<BrandingImage>
